sqlMap.select: select * from commute where emp_code=#emp_code# and com_go>=#checkDay#
select count(*) from commute where emp_code=#emp_code# and com_go>=#checkDay#
sqlMap.insert: insert into commute(com_code, emp_code, com_go, com_off, com_status, com_ip) values(com_code_seq.nextval, #emp_code#, sysdate, #com_off#, #com_status#, #com_ip#)
sqlMap.update: update commute set com_off=sysdate, com_status=#com_status# where com_code=#com_code#
